GSD.product_version: versions from v4.11 to before v5.19.9
GSD.description:
net/smc: Fix possible access to freed memory in link clear

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.9 by commit 89fcb70f1acd6b0bbf2f7bfbf45d7aa75a9bdcde, it was introduced in version v4.11 by commit bd4ad57718cc86d2972a20f9791cd079996a4dd6. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net/smc: Fix possible access to freed memory in link clear
